original_title: A Hard Day's Day - A Day in the Life of a Beatles Tribute Band
overview: The mockumentary depicts a day in the life of a Beatles tribute band, shot in the spirit and style of "A Hard Day's Night." In the short, "The MopTops" flee their fans, lose their Ringo (who's Chinese) and when they arrive at their gig, its not what they expected.
tagline: They'd be the greatest Beatles tribute... if their Ringo wasn't Chinese.
title: A Hard Day's Day - A Day in the Life of a Beatles Tribute Band
